george_omalley sits on the bath edge, reading about rashes. izzie_stevens knocks and tells george_omalley to hurry. izzie_stevens asks what george_omalley is doing. george_omalley says it's private, and izzie_stevens laughs, saying she'll wait.
In her room, meredith_grey talks quietly to a nurse at her mother's nursing home. meredith_grey hangs up when derek_shepherd wakes up.

george_omalley leaves the bathroom. izzie_stevens tells george_omalley not to be ashamed, assuming he was masturbating. meredith_grey wonders why george_omalley and izzie_stevens argue. izzie_stevens explains she caught george_omalley in the act. They all walk away.
derek_shepherd comes out with his ringing phone but ignores it.

cristina_yang talks to a doctor about her abortion scheduled for the 16th. cristina_yang hangs up when preston_burke approaches. preston_burke asks cristina_yang why she didn't answer her page last night. cristina_yang thinks about telling preston_burke she's pregnant but walks away.

The richard_webber walks by, swaying and rubbing his head. george_omalley talks quietly to olivia in a corner. The richard_webber passes and asks cristina_yang if she feels okay. The richard_webber starts to tell cristina_yang he feels itchy, but izzie_stevens interrupts. george_omalley and olivia leave. izzie_stevens realizes george_omalley wasn't playing with Jimmy and the twins. izzie_stevens looks confused, wondering what george_omalley was doing.

george_omalley talks to alex_karev in the locker room. george_omalley asks alex_karev to check his rash because he can't see it well. alex_karev kneels down, inspects george_omalley's penis, and tells george_omalley it's syphilis. Then, alex_karev walks away.

preston_burke, alex_karev, and george_omalley treat a patient by inserting a camera. bill, a friend of preston_burke's, is involved. preston_burke tells them to focus only on the baby in the patient's uterus. They finish and schedule a CT scan.

In another operating room, meredith_grey looks worriedly at derek_shepherd in the gallery. meredith_grey is helping the richard_webber and miranda_bailey. miranda_bailey and meredith_grey are concerned as richard_webber complains about the lighting, but they continue the surgery.

cristina_yang and izzie_stevens examine a patient with a very large abdomen. The patient says it has been growing for some time. george_omalley asks for george_omalley's bloodwork. izzie_stevens takes it from george_omalley and questions why george_omalley has it if it's not surgical. izzie_stevens also asks who has syphilis. george_omalley pulls izzie_stevens into a room and closes the shades. izzie_stevens teases george_omalley but reassures george_omalley that a few penicillin doses will cure it.
During surgery, the richard_webber drops an instrument and blinks rapidly. The richard_webber steps back, letting miranda_bailey finish.
After seeing the CT results and discussing george_omalley's condition, alex_karev and george_omalley go to find preston_burke.

cristina_yang and izzie_stevens enter the_franklin's room and inform the_franklin he has ascites. the_franklin and the_franklin's wife look worried, but the_franklin's daughter seems uninterested, blaming the_franklin's drinking.

While reviewing results, alex_karev and preston_burke argue about what something resembles, with alex_karev joking it looks like an ovary. george_omalley enters and gives preston_burke some results. preston_burke is surprised to find out it's an ovary.

cristina_yang and izzie_stevens inform miranda_bailey about the_franklin. After testing, miranda_bailey tells cristina_yang and izzie_stevens they can perform a paracentesis. cristina_yang and izzie_stevens celebrate as miranda_bailey leaves.

alex_karev and george_omalley walk down the stairs. george_omalley kisses olivia, and alex_karev leaves when ignored. During the kiss, george_omalley pulls away. olivia asks if george_omalley is breaking up with her. george_omalley assures olivia he isn't. After struggling to explain, george_omalley finally tells olivia he has syphilis. Shocked, olivia quickly walks away.

derek_shepherd goes to the richard_webber's office and asks about the richard_webber's behavior. The richard_webber explains that a few weeks ago, his vision in his right eye became blurry during surgery. After a few hours, the issue returned. The richard_webber allowed derek_shepherd to run tests but wanted them kept secret.

alex_karev and george_omalley walked outside with their trays, passing olivia's table. olivia seemed to ignore george_omalley. alex_karev and george_omalley joined cristina_yang, izzie_stevens, and meredith_grey. george_omalley was surprised to find out all three knew about his syphilis. alex_karev reassured george_omalley that women might now see him as a "player."

preston_burke went into bill's room and explained the mass was an ovary, not a tumor. bill was initially shocked, but preston_burke assured bill they could remove it, and it wouldn't change anything about his identity as a man.

In another room, george_omalley bent over a gurney while alex_karev prepared to give george_omalley penicillin. meredith_grey criticized alex_karev's method, so alex_karev gave meredith_grey the needle and left. izzie_stevens and cristina_yang quickly followed. After meredith_grey finished, george_omalley left angrily. meredith_grey then quietly spoke to one of ellis_grey's nurses.
derek_shepherd and richard_webber walked down a corridor. derek_shepherd mentioned he had an MRI scheduled. As derek_shepherd left, patricia approached richard_webber with a situation.

richard_webber faced a group of doctors and complained about three interns, four residents, and six nurses diagnosed with syphilis on the surgical floor. olivia and george_omalley exchanged glances from across the room. After a stern lecture, richard_webber instructed patricia to demonstrate safe sex using a condom and banana.
derek_shepherd quietly entered and asked richard_webber to come for the MRI.

cristina_yang waited in line when preston_burke saw her and asked why she was avoiding him. cristina_yang claimed she wasn't and was just in the syphilis line. preston_burke told her she didn't need to be there and asked if he should be. cristina_yang said no, and they both left the line in different directions.
izzie_stevens joined cristina_yang, and they went to the_franklin's room. In the_franklin's room, they gave him an anesthetic and said they needed to wait.
derek_shepherd and richard_webber looked at the_franklin's MRI scans and found a tumor on his optic nerve. derek_shepherd planned a secret surgery for that night.
The richard_webber leaves, and meredith_grey comes in to hear about the secret from derek_shepherd.

In the_franklin's room, izzie_stevens and cristina_yang notice the_franklin has a lot of fluids. izzie_stevens checks the_franklin's pulse and finds none. cristina_yang presses the code button while izzie_stevens starts CPR. The code team arrives, but it's too late.

cristina_yang and izzie_stevens leave, with izzie_stevens worried they missed something. miranda_bailey reassures izzie_stevens and cristina_yang they did everything possible. cristina_yang asks about an autopsy, but miranda_bailey says there won't be one because the family refused. cristina_yang is frustrated because she wanted to know the cause.

derek_shepherd approaches miranda_bailey and meredith_grey in the hall. miranda_bailey asks derek_shepherd to inform the richard_webber she'll attend his surgery. After miranda_bailey leaves, meredith_grey asks derek_shepherd if she should get tested, mentioning they never had rules. derek_shepherd assures meredith_grey it's unnecessary, joking they are like a condom ad. As derek_shepherd and meredith_grey walk away, derek_shepherd's phone rings, but he ignores it.

In the operating room, preston_burke is performing surgery on bill. dr_knox informs preston_burke that she needs to sew up a hole in the bladder wall. dr_knox then reveals that bill's wife is pregnant, but bill is sterile, so the baby isn't his.
izzie_stevens and cristina_yang meet with the_franklin's wife and daughter to ask for permission for an autopsy. The mother thinks about it, but alice_franklin refuses.

In a quiet hallway, izzie_stevens tells cristina_yang they should do the autopsy because the_franklin's wife seemed to want it. Despite meredith_grey's warning, cristina_yang agrees with izzie_stevens. meredith_grey gives in and tells izzie_stevens and cristina_yang that miranda_bailey will be busy from 7 to 11, then leaves.
derek_shepherd enters his operating room and sees the richard_webber and miranda_bailey preparing for his surgery.
In another room, izzie_stevens feels uneasy about taking the_franklin's body. Meanwhile, cristina_yang opens a textbook and starts the autopsy.

derek_shepherd, miranda_bailey, and meredith_grey finish the richard_webber's surgery. miranda_bailey tells meredith_grey it went well but warns that a mistake could cause blindness. miranda_bailey asks meredith_grey to page cristina_yang and izzie_stevens. meredith_grey tries to cover for cristina_yang and izzie_stevens, but miranda_bailey realizes meredith_grey is lying. miranda_bailey asks another doctor to finish and leaves to find cristina_yang and izzie_stevens.

Outside bill's room, preston_burke argues with holly. holly admits the baby isn't bill's and she cheated, but says they are happy. holly asks preston_burke not to tell bill if he's a friend. preston_burke agrees not to tell as a friend but insists he must as a doctor.

meredith_grey talks to ms_henry, apologizing for not visiting. ms_henry mentions meredith_grey's mother remembered her and asked when she finished work. derek_shepherd approaches, and meredith_grey quickly ends the call. Suddenly, meredith_grey breaks down and tells derek_shepherd her mother isn't traveling or writing a book; she has advanced Alzheimer's. derek_shepherd kisses meredith_grey and smooths her hair.
The richard_webber sees derek_shepherd and meredith_grey from his room and looks unhappy.

miranda_bailey confronts cristina_yang and izzie_stevens for ignoring the patient's family's wishes and technically committing assault. miranda_bailey asks cristina_yang and izzie_stevens if they have a response. izzie_stevens shows miranda_bailey a large heart weighing 600 grams. Reluctantly, miranda_bailey allows cristina_yang and izzie_stevens to run tests.

meredith_grey visits the richard_webber's room and is relieved the richard_webber can still see. The richard_webber warns meredith_grey to avoid derek_shepherd, saying she's making a mistake. meredith_grey insists she isn't.

izzie_stevens, cristina_yang, and miranda_bailey meet with alice_franklin and the_franklin. alice_franklin threatens to sue, but cristina_yang explains the_franklin died from hemochromatosis, not heavy drinking. Concerned alice_franklin might have it, cristina_yang, izzie_stevens, and miranda_bailey request a blood test for alice_franklin. izzie_stevens agrees but sneakily gives alice_franklin the autopsy form to sign first.

george_omalley observes preston_burke talking to bill. olivia enters the locker room and tells george_omalley she was seeing alex_karev before him but ended it because she liked george_omalley more. Upset, george_omalley punches alex_karev, accusing alex_karev of giving him syphilis.

meredith_grey finds derek_shepherd in the lobby. meredith_grey and derek_shepherd discuss plans for the night. derek_shepherd sees a red-haired woman and apologizes to meredith_grey. The woman approaches meredith_grey and derek_shepherd and asks derek_shepherd why he ignored her call. The woman introduces herself to meredith_grey as addison_shepherd and implies meredith_grey is involved with addison_shepherd's husband.
